overview: Cuma Sutra serves up a sexual feast of heart-pounding meditation and desire, filmed entirely on location at a yoga retreat in the rolling hills of southern Washington. Right away, you're whisked away to nirvana as Black Scorpion Exclusive D.O. quietly meditates in a field, when he's approached by the sultry Pistal Pete, a hungry stud who's far more interested in D.O's sexual chakras than picking grapes. The electricity between these two beautiful men keeps you on the verge of climax as you take in magnetic scenes of kissing, fondling, sucking, rimming, and a pre-climactic fucking scene in which D.O's prowess leads Pete along the ultimate path to sexual release...
tagline: The Art of Man to Man Sex
title: Cuma Sutra
